00010   : _obj(dynamic_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl*>( a_obj )),
00011     _createdObject( false)
00012 {
00013     
00014     if( _obj==0 ){
00015     
00016       Histogram1D* f = 
00017         dynamic_cast< Histogram1D* >( a_obj ) ;
00018       
00019       if( f != 0 )
00020         _obj = f->obj() ;
00021     }
00022 
00023     // do some sanity checks ...
00024     if( _obj==0 ){
00025       throw lcio::Exception("Cannot create Histogram1D from sth."
00026                       " that is not LCGenericObjectImpl" ) ;
00027     } 
00028     
00029     if(  ( _obj->getNInt()    != kNHistogram1DInts )    || 
00030          ( _obj->getNFloat()  < kNHistogram1DFloats )  || 
00031          ( _obj->getNDouble() != kNHistogram1DDoubles )   ) {
00032

00034     }
